version_description:
Alfred’s latest iOS version supports manual recording for Android Cameras. The layout has been corrected for 12.9-inch iPad Pro, and we improved the lens-switching mechanism to handle certain unusual situations.

Thank you for downloading Alfred!
Please bear in mind that there is no way for us to interact with you in the review section. If you find any bugs, please don’t rate us down. Kindly let us know by emailing us at support@my-alfred.com or joining us at Alfred Center (https://alfred.camera/forum/). Your opinions are invaluable to us!

Alfred’s latest iOS version supports manual recording for Android Cameras. The layout has been corrected for 12.9-inch iPad Pro, and we improved the lens-switching mechanism to handle certain unusual situations.

Thank you for downloading Alfred!
Please bear in mind that there is no way for us to interact with you in the review section. If you find any bugs, please don’t rate us down. Kindly let us know by emailing us at support@my-alfred.com or joining us at Alfred Center (https://alfred.camera/forum/). Your opinions are invaluable to us!
Check your Camera device's health status with Alfred's latest version! Moreover, the Viewer now supports landscape mode. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.
Check your Camera device's health status with Alfred's latest version! Moreover, the Viewer now supports landscape mode. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

Alfred’s latest iOS version fixes the glitch/green screen problem that happens when iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad mini 2/3 are used as Camera devices. The way Camera creates videos has been optimized so that they load faster. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

Alfred’s latest iOS version fixes the glitch/green screen problem that happens when iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad mini 2/3 are used as Camera devices. The way Camera creates videos has been optimized so that they load faster. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

*** IMPORTANT NOTICE FOR VERSION 440 USERS *** The new version addresses a critical issue in version 440. All users who downloaded version 440 should upgrade.

Alfred’s latest iOS version fixes the glitch/green screen problem that happens when iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad mini 2/3 are used as Camera devices. The way Camera creates videos has been optimized so that they load faster. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

*** IMPORTANT NOTICE FOR VERSION 440 USERS *** The new version addresses a critical issue in version 440. All users who downloaded version 440 should upgrade.

Alfred’s latest iOS version fixes the glitch/green screen problem that happens when iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad mini 2/3 are used as Camera devices. The way Camera creates videos has been optimized so that they load faster. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

Alfred’s latest iOS version fixes the glitch/green screen problem that happens when iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad mini 2/3 are used as Camera devices. The way Camera creates videos has been optimized so that they load faster. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

Alfred’s latest iOS version fixes the glitch/green screen problem that happens when iPhone 5s, iPad Air, iPad mini 2/3 are used as Camera devices. The way Camera creates videos has been optimized so that they load faster. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.
You can now subscribe to Alfred Premium for multiple months with a discount! We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.
You can now subscribe to Alfred Premium for multiple months with a discount! We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.
You can now subscribe to Alfred Premium for multiple months with a discount! We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.
You can now subscribe to Alfred Premium for multiple months with a discount! We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

Camera settings are now locked when Guided Access is enabled to enhance account protection, and Low-Light Filter has been optimized. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

Camera settings are now locked when Guided Access is enabled to enhance account protection, and Low-Light Filter has been optimized. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

Camera settings are now locked when Guided Access is enabled to enhance account protection, and Low-Light Filter has been optimized. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.
The latest version of Alfred for iOS addresses the video recording issue multiple models have encountered as Camera devices.
The latest version of Alfred for iOS addresses the video recording issue multiple models have encountered as Camera devices.

In the latest version of Alfred for iOS, you can mute the Viewer's speakers during live-viewing sessions! The ad-removal upgrade, Alfred Plus, is available as well. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

In the latest version of Alfred for iOS, you can mute the Viewer's speakers during live-viewing sessions! The ad-removal upgrade, Alfred Plus, is available as well. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

In the latest version of Alfred for iOS, you can mute the Viewer's speakers during live-viewing sessions! The ad-removal upgrade, Alfred Plus, is available as well. We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.
Great news: T-Mobile 4G LTE users can watch live feed now!
Great news: T-Mobile 4G LTE users can watch live feed now!

Alfred's latest iOS update presents significant UI modifications:
1. To give you consistent user experience on the iOS platform, we have revamped the menu design in Viewer mode to make it sleeker and easier to use.
2. The Arabic version can now be displayed properly.
We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

1. To give you consistent user experience on the iOS platform, we have revamped the menu design in Viewer mode to make it sleeker and easier to use.
2. The Arabic version can now be displayed properly.
We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

We also fixed some bugs and made some improvements, as we always do.

The latest Alfred for iOS version addresses an issue that may cause connection interruptions. Please update at your earliest convenience.

- Bug fix and performance improvement

Enjoy smarter home security with rich notification support! Try it on your new iPhone to interact with Alfred efficiently! For more information, please visit: https://alfred.camera/forum/t/1310081
Enjoy smarter home security with rich notification support! Try it on your new iPhone to interact with Alfred efficiently! For more information, please visit: https://alfred.camera/forum/t/1310081

This version comes with some look-n-feel tweaks on menu and splash screens. Introducing new Camera UI design that brings you more information and makes common settings more accessible. Viewer UI now also loads a lot faster than before. For more information, please visit: https://alfred.camera/forum/t/1515415

This version comes with some look-n-feel tweaks on menu and splash screens. Introducing new Camera UI design that brings you more information and makes common settings more accessible. Viewer UI now also loads a lot faster than before. For more information, please visit: https://alfred.camera/forum/t/1515415

- Zoom is joining Alfred as a Premium feature to give you enhanced clarity
- Record longer videos up to 120 seconds when the movement continues for Premium users!
- Improve the experience of manual recording. Now you can simply tap the recording button to shoot videos rather than long press the button to do it
- The video recording algorithm has been further optimized to reduce the cases where long events are broken into multiple recordings
- Bug fix and performance improvement
For more information, please visit:
https://alfred.center

- Siren! Now you can turn on Siren from your Viewer phone while streaming Live.
- Enjoy non-stop security! Motion Detection will now keep working while streaming Live.
- Improved the performance of Person Detection.
- Enhanced the brightness of 720p HD video.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

- You can now watch live streaming with Bluetooth audio devices.
- Viewer mode is no longer supported on devices running iOS 8 or older.
- Improved the experience of live streaming.
- Fixed the usability issue in Motion Detection Reminder and Google Assistant.
- Fixed the battery notification issue on devices running iOS 9 and iOS 10.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.

For more information, please visit:
https://alfred.camera

- New Feature - Stay Zoomed-in
To avoid an unexpected change of the recording area, the field of view will now automatically be reset to 1.0x when the live stream ends.
You can also switch to the “Stay Zoomed-in” mode to keep the camera zoomed-in!

For more information, please visit:
https://alfred.camera

For more information, please visit:
https://alfred.camera

- New Feature - Stay Zoomed-in
To avoid an unexpected change of the recording area, the field of view will now automatically be reset to 1.0x when the live stream ends.
You can also switch to the “Stay Zoomed-in” mode to keep the camera zoomed-in!

We’ve optimized the app for iOS14, bringing you some brand new features in our latest update:
1. Introduced DETECTION ZONE. Specify the areas you want to monitor, reducing the number of false alarms and unwanted alerts.
2. Low-light mode now has three different exposure levels, solving the problem of underexposure during the night.
3. Forgot which camera is which? You can now change your cameras’ names or add notes to them.

For more information, please visit:
https://alfred.camera

We’ve optimized the app for iOS14, bringing you some brand new features in our latest update:
1. Introduced DETECTION ZONE. Specify the areas you want to monitor, reducing the number of false alarms and unwanted alerts.
2. Low-light mode now has three different exposure levels, solving the problem of underexposure during the night.
3. Forgot which camera is which? You can now change your cameras’ names or add notes to them.

For more information, please visit:
